title: Ticket Office Assistant - College Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Ticket Office Assistant Posted/Updated: 10-21-2015 Brief Job Description: Part of game day sales team, developing and implementing ticket sales strategies, coordinating ticket mailings, processing daily deposits, assisting with game management at home ticketed...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
